#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<limits.h>
int main(){
 
long int n,q,max=INT_MIN,min=INT_MAX,i,k;
scanf("%ld %ld", &n,&q);
while(n>0){
scanf("%ld",&k);
if(k<min) min = k;
if(k>max) max = k;
n--;
}
while(q>0){
scanf("%ld",&k);
if(k<=max && k>=min) printf("Yes\n");
else printf("No\n");
q--;
}
return 0;
}
